alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 9:37PM MST until January 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. * WHERE... Southern Yuma County, mainly along and south of Highway 36. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Most of Yuma county will see around a trace to 2 inches of snow. However, the far south and southeastern portions of the county could see up to 5 inches of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
